sect1.title: General
sect1.para: This component collects and computes the KD error bit flag and transmits it on the bus. This computation is done cyclically. The DID 0x2A28 gives information on whether an error is present (an active DTC in fault memory) for all nodes when read by tester.
The global variables(static and otherwise), static and extern functions for KDBit_MQB are listed in the class diagram.
